Text: Are there other subtitles than Dutch? It says "Subtitles: Dutch (selectable), does it mean there is any other?

oZZar wrote: "Are there other subtitles than Dutch? It says "Subtitles: Dutch (selectable), does it mean there is any other?"

And it means that subtitles are in Dutch, and only Dutch, and selectable must means that you can close the Dutch subtitles.

And thanks Hornigold, you must be a Dutch guy from The Netherlands.
